head.title: The CDK Application Programming Interface (API)
head.summary: Information about the Java classes of the CDK.

webpage.para: The complete documentation is available as HTML and as tar.gz file from here (cdk-doc package).

Moreover, the documentation is also available as four PDF files, one for each CDK library: core, standard, extra and management:
core
standard (soon)
extra (soon)
management (soon)
